verses.verse: Then answered<WH6030> Zophar<WH6691> the Naamathite<WH5284>, and said<WH559>,
Should not the multitude<WH7230> of words<WH1697> be answered<WH6030>? and should a man<WH376> full of talk<WH8193> be justified<WH6663>?
Should your lies<WH907> make<WH2790> men<WH4962> hold their peace<WH2790>? and when you mock<WH3932>, shall no man make you ashamed<WH3637>?
For you have said<WH559>, My teaching<WH3948> is pure<WH2134>, and I am clean<WH1249> in your eyes<WH5869>.
But<WH199> oh that<WH5414> God<WH433> would speak<WH1696>, and open<WH6605> his lips against you<WH8193>;

And that he would show<WH5046> you the secrets<WH8587> of wisdom<WH2451>, that they are double<WH3718> to that which is<WH8454>! Know<WH3045> therefore that God<WH433> exacts<WH5382> of you less than your iniquity deserves<WH5771>.
Can you by searching<WH2714> find out<WH4672> God<WH433>? can you find<WH4672> out the Almighty<WH7706> unto perfection<WH8503>?
It is as high<WH1363> as heaven<WH8064>; what can you do<WH6466>? deeper<WH6013> than hell<WH7585>; what can you know<WH3045>?
The measure<WH4055> there is longer<WH752> than the earth<WH776>, and broader<WH7342> than the sea<WH3220>.
If he cut off<WH2498>, and shut up<WH5462>, or gather together<WH6950>, then who can hinder him<WH7725>?
For he knows<WH3045> vain<WH7723> men<WH4962>: he sees<WH7200> wickedness<WH205> also<WH995>; will he not then consider it?
For vain<WH5014> man<WH376> would be wise<WH3823>, though man<WH120> be born<WH3205> like a wild ass<WH6501>'s colt<WH5895>.
If you prepare<WH3559> your heart<WH3820>, and stretch<WH6566> out your hands toward him<WH3709>;
If iniquity<WH205> be in your hand<WH3027>, put it far away<WH7368>, and let not wickedness<WH5766> live<WH7931> in your tabernacles<WH168>.
For then shall you lift up<WH5375> your face<WH6440> without spot<WH3971>; Yes<WH3332>, you shall be stedfast, and shall not fear<WH3372>:
Because you shall forget<WH7911> your misery<WH5999>, and remember<WH2142> it as waters<WH4325> that pass away<WH5674>:
And your age<WH2465> shall be clearer<WH6965> than the noonday<WH6672>; you shall shine forth<WH5774>, you shall be as the morning<WH1242>.
And you shall be secure<WH982>, because there is<WH3426> hope<WH8615>; Yes<WH2658>, you shall dig about you<WH7901>, and you shall take your rest in safety<WH983>.
Also you shall lie down<WH7257>, and none shall make you afraid<WH2729>; Yes<WH7227>, many shall make suit<WH2470> unto you<WH6440>.
But the eyes<WH5869> of the wicked<WH7563> shall fail<WH3615>, and they shall not escape<WH6>, and their hope<WH8615> shall be as the giving up<WH4646> of the Spirit<WH5315>.
